posts.name: Max Radermacher
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.63 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • In ancient times, quotes were printed on scrolls and nothing would happen if you tapped on the parchment. In modern times, you can tap on a quoted reply and now the original message is highlighted after it scrolls.
  • We also updated the “Note to Self” chat so that it’s always included in the list of available recipients without having to search for your own name. Self-discovery can be hard, but finding yourself in Signal has never been easier.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.62 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.63.0.821-beta

50 new commits since 7.62.0.809-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.63 [1]

  • Add to profile whitelist when verifying safety number [2]

  • Use .label, not .black, as the foreground color in DM Timer settings [3]

  • Remove en-us from all support links [4]

  • Adjust upper bound of clampedNanoseconds [5]

  • Use GroupMasterKey type instead of serialized Data [6]

  • Briefly dim quoted message after scrolling to it. […] [7]

  • Add withCooperativeRace [8]

  • Remove OWSChatConnectionUsingSSKWebSocket [9]

  • Adjust connection keep-alives/reconnects/tokens [10]

  • Asyncify more OWSChatConnection logic [11]

  • Rename method to be consistent [12]

  • Remove strong reference to RegistrationNavController [13]

  • Persist when disabling Backups remotely fails [14]

  • Fix compile error after bad rebase [15]

  • Start Backups remote-disable in a tx completion block [16]

  • Skip ChooseBackupPlan if reenabling Backups with a paid remote subscription [17]

  • Read local BackupPlan in BackupSettings.loadBackupPlan() [18]

  • More directly set BackupPlan = .paid when re/enabling Backups [19]

  • Encapsulate Backups remote-disabling-failed more fully in BackupDisablingManager [20]

  • Asyncify AppExpiry (née remove TestScheduler use) [21]

  • Remove Schedulers from InMemoryDB [22]

  • Update to LibSignal v0.73.2 [23]

  • De-protocolize/clean up AppExpiry [24]

  • Update connection state after re-warming caches [25]

  • Update expiration banner on significant time ∆s [26]

  • Fix code to check if a build expires today [27]

  • Update UI & connection when the app expires [28]

  • Removed unused remote config [29]

  • Handle non-hot-swappable flags in app extensions [30]

  • Schedule reconnect if we fail to connect [31]

  • Invert web socket state management paradigm [32]

  • Asyncify a few RegCoordinator tests [33]

  • Wait for disconnect before suspending [34]

  • Enforce min TLS version in libsignal based on the remote config [35]

  • Note to Self should always be included in recipient picker [36]

  • Add BackgroundMessageFetcherFactory [37]

  • Update group link error copy [38]

  • Stop processing when the socket closes [39]

  • Add waitUntil(deadline:) for background fetches [40]

  • Open a connection in LazyDatabaseMigratorRunner [41]

  • Add MonotonicDuration [42]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.53.0 [43]

  • Adjust socket check when processing messages [44]

  • Consolidate max group size accesses [45]

  • Remove notion of isSticky from remote configs [46]

  • Set mentionTextViewDelegate earlier [47]

  • Add optional network/5xx retries to NetworkManager [48]

  • Update release notes [49]

  • Update translations [50]

Localization changes for the release are the same, as this is the first build of the release.

Not sure if I understood the release notes correctly, but when I press “New chat”, note to self still appears under the initial of my first name (“C”). My phone language is set to Spanish. I’d expect it to appear in the “N” section.

IMG_0959808×1792 106 KB

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.63.0/d35d6a97353c69167bb26fa8d42f539fc1712623a66c51ebb57eb47072ee4eaa.zip

yfi: in signal4android it’s in N section.

imho: the “best” option is to place it first at the top (above A) regardless of the first letter (depending on the language, there may be other letters than N).

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked:
Ah, that’s a good callout. It’s currently indexed under your account’s display name, not under the (localized) text “Note to Self”…the change is that if you’ve never messaged Note to Self at all, it will appear in this list (where previously it only appeared if you searched for it).

We’ll look into the indexing question!
Why “Note to Self” is just not the first entry?

New Version: 7.63.0.829-beta

2 new commits since 7.63.0.821-beta:

  • Clear pendingPreKeyRotation when an error occurs [1]

  • Update translations [2]

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.64 release.
